_source.text: #3: The fact that you WANT to take away the civil rights of a group of people just because you don't like them makes you no better than many of the authoritarian dictators throughout history, and therefore, I will close this post with an emphatic DIAF.

text: #3: The fact that you **WANT** to take **away** the civil rights of a group of people just **because** you
don't like them makes you no **better** **than** many of the authoritarian dictators throughout history, and therefore, I will **close** this post with an emphatic DIAF.
